page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: For a small village,{LIFTON}has a good range of club activities,with{ {LAUNCESTON}(4 miles distant) offering a wider choice . The {LIFTON}Mens Institute, established in 1860,offers snooker 7 days per week. Ambrosia Social Club offers pool,bar and musical entertainment. Ambrosia also has two football teams in the P&D league.My dad is in the second team. Brownies,Cubs and Guides meet in { {LIFTON COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL}. The ladies badminton is held at the {LIFTON CHURCH HALL}.There is also a childrens badminton held on Fridays in Autumn and Winter. At the{LIFTON CHURCH}they have choir practices on Fridays. These clubs are outside of{LIFTON} but some people attend them:Tennis,
